hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x -e
MANUSCRIPT=imx-4.9.88-2.0.0_ga.xml
# initialize technexion github yocto repository echo "===== Repo init yocto from TechNexion github =====" ${HOME}/bin/repo init -u https://github.com/TechNexion/edm-yocto-bsp.git -b rocko_4.9.y_GA -m $MANUSCRIPT echo "===== Repo sync yocto from TechNexion github =====" ${HOME}/bin/repo sync -j16 -f
# copy QCA RF firmware files from prebuilt archives echo "===== Copy QCA RF Firmware =====" rm -fR sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files/* mkdir -p sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files/wlan mkdir -p sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files/qca [ -f qca_firmware/linux-firmware-qca-tn.bb ] && cp qca_firmware/linux-firmware-qca-tn.bb sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware [ -f qca_firmware/CadenceLicense.txt ] && cp qca_firmware/CadenceLicense.txt sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files [ -f qca_firmware/Notice.txt ] && cp qca_firmware/Notice.txt sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files [ -f qca_firmware/bdwlan30.bin ] && cp qca_firmware/bdwlan30.bin sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files [ -f qca_firmware/otp30.bin ] && cp qca_firmware/otp30.bin sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files [ -f qca_firmware/qwlan30.bin ] && cp qca_firmware/qwlan30.bin sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files [ -f qca_firmware/utf30.bin ] && cp qca_firmware/utf30.bin sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files [ -f qca_firmware/wlan/cfg.dat ] && cp qca_firmware/wlan/cfg.dat sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files/wlan [ -f qca_firmware/wlan/qcom_cfg.ini ] && cp qca_firmware/wlan/qcom_cfg.ini sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files/wlan [ -f qca_firmware/qca/nvm_tlv_3.2.bin ] && cp qca_firmware/qca/nvm_tlv_3.2.bin sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files/qca [ -f qca_firmware/qca/rampatch_tlv_3.2.tlv ] && cp qca_firmware/qca/rampatch_tlv_3.2.tlv sources/meta-edm-bsp-release/recipes-kernel/linux-firmware/files/qca
# Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts echo "===== Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts =====" sed -i ':a;N;$!ba;s/EULA_ACCEPTED=\n/echo "ACCEPT_FSL_EULA = \\"1\\"" >> conf\/local.conf\n/' sources/base/setup-environment
# copy new EULA echo "===== Copy EULA =====" cp sources/meta-fsl-bsp-release/imx/EULA.txt sources/meta-freescale/EULA

#!/bin/bash -x -e
DLDIR=/home/jenkins/data/src/yocto2.4/download SSTATEDIR=/home/jenkins/data/src/yocto2.4/sstat
SOMs=("pico-imx7") # "edm-imx6" "pico-imx6" "tek3-imx6ul" "tep1-imx6ul" "edm-imx7" "pico-imx6ul" "tek-imx6" "tep1-imx7" "pico-imx8m") # "pico-imx8m" DISTROs=("xwayland") # "x11" "fb" "wayland" TGTIMGTYPEs=("fsl-image-validation-imx" "fsl-image-qt5-validation-imx") # "core-image-minimal" "core-image-base" "core-image-sato" "fsl-image-machine-test"
# setup environment variables for building # BASEBOARDs=("pi" "nymph" "dwarf" "hobbit") # DISPLAYs=("lvds7" "hdmi720p" "hdmi1080p" "lcd" "lvds7_hdmi720p") # WLANs=("qca" "brcm" "ath-pci") setup_env_vars () { case $1 in pico-imx8m) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" ;; pico-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" ;; pico-imx7) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" ;; pico-imx6ul) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca" ;; edm-imx6) board="fairy" disp="lvds7" wlan="qca" ;; edm-imx7) board="gnome" wlan="qca" ;; tep1-imx7) wlan="ath-pci" ;; tep1-imx6ul) ;; tek-imx6) disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" ;; tek3-imx6ul) ;; *) ;; esac }
# Loop each som distro image_type and configs for som in ${SOMs[*]}; do for distro in ${DISTROs[*]}; do
# go to workspace for next build cd ${WORKSPACE}
# Set up the build environment variables setup_env_vars $som
# setup yocto build environment MACHINE=$som DISTRO=fsl-imx-$distro WIFI_FIRMWARE=y WIFI_MODULE=$wlan DISPLAY=$disp BASEBOARD=$board source edm-setup-release.sh -b build-$som
# get current build dir and check if local.conf exists BUILD_DIR=. if [ ! -e $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf ]; then echo -e "\n ERROR - No build directory is set yet. Run the 'setup-environment' script before running this script to create " $BUILD_DIR echo -e "\n" return 1 else # set the download directory [ -d ${DLDIR} ] || mkdir -p ${DLDIR} [ -d ${SSTATEDIR} ] || mkdir -p ${SSTATEDIR} # setup conf/local.conf echo "BB_NUMBER_THREADS ?= \"12\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf if grep "^DL_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^DL_DIR.*|DL_DIR = "'$DLDIR'"|g' -i $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf else echo "DL_DIR = \"$DLDIR\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf fi if grep "^SSTATE_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^SSTATE_DIR.*|SSTATE_DIR = "'$SSTATEDIR'"|g' -i $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf else echo "SSTATE_DIR = \"$SSTATEDIR\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf fi cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/bblayers.conf fi
for target in ${TGTIMGTYPEs[*]}; do # building the yocto with preset config params echo "===== Building SOM:$som DISTRO:fsl-imx-$distro TARGET:$target ====="
# Compile using bitbake bitbake $target done done done
